lead_paragraph: RSA Security is working with military companies to replace their SecurID tokens “on an accelerated timetable,” the company’s executive chairman said.

headline.seo: RSA Security Offers to Replace Most SecurID Tokens
headline.main: Security Firm Offers to Replace Tokens After Attack
headline.print_headline: Security Firm Offers to Replace Tokens After Attack
